Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Maculatin 2.1 (XXA, natural AMPs; UCLL1c; frog, amphibians, animals)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: 47.37% similar to AP00017 (Aurein 2.4).Activity: Active against B. cereus (MIC 100 ug/ml), E.coli (MIC> 100 ug/ml), L.lactis (MIC>100 ug/ml), L. innocua (MIC 100 ug/ml), M. luteus (MIC 100 ug/ml), P.multocida (MIC>100 ug/ml), S. aureus (MIC 100 ug/ml), S. epidermidis (MIC 50 ug/ml), S.faecalis (MIC>100 ug/ml), and S. uberis (MIC 25 ug/ml).Updated 12/2010; Jan2023; 12/2024.
Literature Information.Author: Rozek T, Waugh RJ, Steinborner ST, Bowie JH, Tyler MJ, Wallace JC.1998, Australia
Literature Information.Title: The maculatin peptide from the skin glands of the tree frog Litoria genimaculata. A comparison of the structures and antibacterial activities of maculatin 1.1 and caerin 1.1
